content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 3, Roma 3.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 3, Roma 3.
Attempt missed. Gary Cahill (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a cross following a set piece situation.
Foul by Radja Nainggolan (Roma).
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Pedro (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Lorenzo Pellegrini (Roma).
Substitution, Roma. Stephan El Shaarawy replaces Diego Perotti.
Attempt blocked. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Antonio Rüdiger with a cross.
Attempt missed. Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Maxime Gonalons.
Substitution, Roma. Alessandro Florenzi replaces Kevin Strootman.
Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Roma) header from very close range is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Bruno Peres with a cross.
Substitution, Chelsea. Willian replaces Eden Hazard.
Substitution, Chelsea. Antonio Rüdiger replaces Davide Zappacosta.
Attempt missed. Radja Nainggolan (Roma) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Lorenzo Pellegrini.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Roma 3. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Pedro with a cross.
Substitution, Roma. Lorenzo Pellegrini replaces Gerson.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Roma 3. Edin Dzeko (Roma) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Aleksandar Kolarov with a cross following a set piece situation.
Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea).
Diego Perotti (Roma) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Pedro (Chelsea) because of an injury.
Delay in match Federico Fazio (Roma) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Pedro.
Foul by Gerson (Roma).
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right.
Offside, Roma. Federico Fazio tries a through ball, but Gerson is caught offside.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Roma 2. Edin Dzeko (Roma) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Federico Fazio with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right misses to the right. Assisted by Pedro with a through ball.
Attempt saved. Diego Perotti (Roma) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Kevin Strootman.
Attempt missed. Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Pedro.
Attempt missed. Gerson (Roma) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Kevin Strootman with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Substitution, Chelsea. Pedro replaces David Luiz.
Offside, Chelsea. David Luiz tries a through ball, but Álvaro Morata is caught offside.
Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Radja Nainggolan (Roma).
Foul by Álvaro Morata (Chelsea).
Juan Jesus (Roma) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Gerson (Roma) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Radja Nainggolan.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Gary Cahill.
Attempt blocked. Kevin Strootman (Roma) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Edin Dzeko.
Attempt missed. David Luiz (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Attempt missed. Radja Nainggolan (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Davide Zappacosta.
Second Half begins Chelsea 2, Roma 1.
First Half ends, Chelsea 2, Roma 1.
Offside, Chelsea. Tiemoué Bakayoko tries a through ball, but Álvaro Morata is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Attempt blocked. Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Davide Zappacosta with a cross.
Offside, Chelsea. Thibaut Courtois tries a through ball, but Eden Hazard is caught offside.
Gary Cahill (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Radja Nainggolan (Roma).
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Roma 1. Aleksandar Kolarov (Roma) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Maxime Gonalons.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Roma 0. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner following a fast break.
Attempt blocked. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Attempt saved. Diego Perotti (Roma) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Edin Dzeko.
Attempt saved. Radja Nainggolan (Roma) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. Diego Perotti (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Kevin Strootman.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Gerson (Roma) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Álvaro Morata (Chelsea).
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Roma 0. David Luiz (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner.
Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Gerson (Roma).
